options.tooltip: play with all the cards found in the official base game!

options.name: Naysayers
options.tooltip: Add extra cards to the deck designed by The Naysayers (in development)

Turns.tooltip: Enable turns and order them clockwise starting with the Chancellor

Turn Order Seating.tooltip: On Game start, players will be seated Based on the set turn order

Randomize Turn Order.tooltip: Randomize the turn order of all exiles and citizens every game

Smart Warbands.tooltip:
quality of life plugin that will make managing warbands easier in situations like offering citizenship

	- when you're citizened, your warbands will turn purple
	- when you're exiled, your warbands will change to your exile color
	- citizens have a purple warband bag that reflects the number of warbands in the chancellors bag
	- you can put warbands in any warband bag and they will be moved to the correct bag

Auto Rest.tooltip:
quality of life plugin that will add an 'Automate Rest Phase' button to player boards

	- Resets supply
	- Returns favor to favor banks
	- Returns secrets to player board
	- Advances turn if turns are enabled

Auto Tavern Songs.tooltip:
If you have Tavern Songs or Oracular Pig and hover over the respective deck/discard,
 UI will pop up showing you the top three cards

Round Counter.tooltip:
quality of life plugin that will increment the round counter at the beginning of
 the chancellors turn. (Turns required)
